mapper.insert: insert into PENALTY_CASE_FORM (CASE_ID, UNDERTAKER, CHUFA_TIME, CHUFA_TIMES, PENALTY_FILE_NO, PENALTY_FILE_ID, IS_DESCUSS, IS_SERIOUS_CASE, IS_BEYOND_EIGHTY, CHUFA_TYPE_ID, CHUFA_TYPE_NAME, CHUFA_BASIS, CHUFA_RESULT, IS_LOWER_LIMIT_MONEY, IS_IDENTIFY, IDENTIFY_TYPE, IDENTIFY_ORG, IDENTIFY_PERSON, IDENTIFY_TIME, IDENTIFY_RESULT, MEMO, GOODS_INVOLVED, GOODS_COUNT, GOODS_DISPOSE_RESULT, IS_DQDJ, PENALTY_CONTENT,GOODS_UNIT) values (#{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{undertaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chufaTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{chufaTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{penaltyFileNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{penaltyFileId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isDescuss,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isSeriousCase,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isBeyondEighty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{chufaTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chufaTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chufaBasis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chufaResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isLowerLimitMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isIdentify,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{identifyType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{identifyOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identifyPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{identifyResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsInvolved,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsDisposeResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDqdj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{penaltyContent,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{goodsUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update PENALTY_CASE_FORM
CASE_ID = #{record.caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNDERTAKER = #{record.undertaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHUFA_TIME = #{record.chufaTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CHUFA_TIMES = #{record.chufaTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PENALTY_FILE_NO = #{record.penaltyFileNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PENALTY_FILE_ID = #{record.penaltyFileId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_DESCUSS = #{record.isDescuss,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_SERIOUS_CASE = #{record.isSeriousCase,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_BEYOND_EIGHTY = #{record.isBeyondEighty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHUFA_TYPE_ID = #{record.chufaTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHUFA_TYPE_NAME = #{record.chufaTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHUFA_BASIS = #{record.chufaBasis,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHUFA_RESULT = #{record.chufaResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_LOWER_LIMIT_MONEY = #{record.isLowerLimitMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_IDENTIFY = #{record.isIdentify,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IDENTIFY_TYPE = #{record.identifyType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IDENTIFY_ORG = #{record.identifyOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDENTIFY_PERSON = #{record.identifyPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDENTIFY_TIME = #{record.identifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IDENTIFY_RESULT = #{record.identifyResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMO = #{record.memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_INVOLVED = #{record.goodsInvolved,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_COUNT = #{record.goodsCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_DISPOSE_RESULT = #{record.goodsDisposeResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DQDJ = #{record.isDqdj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PENALTY_CONTENT = #{record.penaltyContent,jdbcType=CLOB},
